pull.title: Bugfix: PrioritiseTransaction updates the mempool tx counter
pull.body:
The mempool's nTransactionsUpdated is used by getblocktemplate
to trigger new invocations of CreateNewBlock().

events.message:
Bugfix: PrioritiseTransaction updates the mempool tx counter

The mempool's nTransactionsUpdated is used by getblocktemplate
to trigger new invocations of CreateNewBlock().

events.body: Rebased (due to conflict in the test)

tested ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10196/commits/6c2e25caf6b6e55bbb4161f815f1c6402ac10d10

Test fails on master, so OK.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -115,5 +115,16 @@ def run_test(self):
         assert_equal(self.nodes[0].sendrawtransaction(tx_hex), tx_id)
         assert(tx_id in self.nodes[0].getrawmempool())
 
+        # Test that calling prioritisetransaction is sufficient to trigger
comments.body:
nit: What about some `self.log.info` call here?

```C++
self.log.info("Assert that prioritising transaction changes the block template")
```
